string.name: name
string.value: A New Skill for Blaze Wizards
If I think long and hard about #p1101002#'s words, that means I may be able to learn a new skill from #b#p1101004##k

#p1101004# told me there is indeed a new skill, but it's dangerous for me to learn the skill right now based on my level. He also proceeded to challenge me to prove that I deserve to learn the new skill. To prove it, I must head over to #m130020000#, enter #bthe 3rd Drill Hall#k, and bring back #t4032121#...\n\n#i4032121# #t4032121# #b#c4032121# / 1#k
I was able to defeat the boss monster and bring back #t4032121#. #p1101004# told me that I deserved to learn the new skill and taught me something called Ifrit.

...? What is it? A new skill? Are you talking to me, #p1101002#? I thought I told everyone to keep it a secret... anyway, there, there is a new skill out there, but... honestly I think it's too dangerous a skill for you to take on, and your level is too low.
#b#L0#I still want to learn the skill.#l
#L1#Since it's considered dangerous, I guess I won't...#l
#k

...If you really want the skill, then there is a way. You... will have to prove it to me that you are strong enough to handle this new skill. It will not be easy, and it may even be life-threatening. Do... you still want to do it?
Are you backing out because it's considered dangerous? I... was expecting a different answer.

Head over to the end of Training Forest, and you'll reach #m130020000#. Go to #bthe 3rd Drill Hall#k, take the test that's available there, and bring back #b#t4032121##k with you. Then, and only then, will I teach you the new skill.
...That's good, but it's a bit... you know.. Unfortunate... no no, what am I saying? Safety first! Safety before power...
Wow, you managed to bring back #t4032121#! That's amazing! I am so glad you brought it back. I was actually very concerned, you know. You are definitely ready to take on the new skill!
Here's the new skill for the Blaze Wizard, #bIfrit#k! Please use it to your advantage!

I see that you were unable to acquire #b#t4032121##k. Enter #bthe 3rd Drill Hall#k at #m130020000#, take the test, and bring back #t4032121# with you. It, it's going to be quite dangerous, so please be ready for whatever.
